concept.title: Getting Started with the Eucalyptus Management Console
concept.shortdesc: This section helps you get started using your Eucalyptus cloud with the Eucalyptus User Console.

note.p: This section primarily deals with using the Eucalyptus command line. For complete documentation on using web-based the Eucalyptus Console, see .

conbody.p: To access Eucalyptus with the Management Console, you'll need a password for the Management Console. Talk to your cloud administrator to get your keys and passwords.
